name: Composition of steering group and observers
Results tables
definition: Results tables from the study uploaded to the catalogue. Upload in a standard form is envisioned, to facilitate visualisation.

name: Study report
definition: A link to the study report, if publicly available online

name: Study, other information
definition: Any other file required for the study (up to 5 files up to 20MB each) and/or URLs to other relevant resources describing the study

name: Data source ETL specifications
definition: If available, documents describing the mapping of the data source to the CDM (including codes and scripts to transform original data to CDM)

name: Governance details
definition: Documents or webpages that describe the overall governance of the data source and processes and procedures for data capture and management, data quality check and validation results

name: Protocol document
definition: An uploaded version of the protocol, if a URL or EU PAS entry is not available. Please note that the document will be made public.
